delivery.title: Delivery of Products
delivery.description: Efficient delivery from Skloresurs: reliable and fast. Optimal delivery times in Ukraine and abroad.

content.main:
We understand the importance of timely and safe delivery, which is why our transportation department has a modern fleet equipped with cranes. This allows us to safely load and unload glass packages of any size and weight.

Glass packages are carefully packaged to prevent damage during transport and securely attached to the transport.

Our drivers have years of experience and are well-versed in the routes, which helps reduce delivery time and ensure the highest quality of service.

components.title: Glass Processing Components
components.description: The best glass processing components from Skloresurs. Quality and reliability for your business.

seminars.title: Seminars
seminars.description: Join our educational seminars: up-to-date information and skills for development. Join our team of experts!

content.main:
Our company conducts educational seminars on the topic of "Glass in Modern Architecture" to enhance the knowledge and effectiveness of employees in the glass industry.

    Seminar Sections:
  • Introduction to Skloresurs
  • Presentation of new technical capabilities and products
  • Detailed overview of glass characteristics and properties in industry

Seminar duration up to 2 hours and 45 minutes
